name: 236-33 foggy autumn cardigan
sizes_available: s – m – l – xl – xxl – xxxl
notes:
knitted jacket in drops air. the piece is worked top down, with raglan and double bands. sizes s - xxxl.

drops design: pattern ai-404; yarn group c or a + a

**sizes**: s - m - l - xl - xxl - xxxl

**materials**:
drops air from garnstudio (belongs to yarn group c)
250-300-300-350-400-400 g colour 10, fog

drops buttons no 630: 6-6-6-6-7-7 items

**needles**:
drops circular needle size 5.5 mm: length 80 cm.
drops circular needle size 5 mm: length 80 cm.
drops circular needle size 4 mm: length 80 cm
drops double pointed needles size 5.5 mm.
drops double pointed needles size 4 mm.
the technique magic loop can be used – you then only need circular needle of 80 cm in each size.

**knitting tension**:
16 stitches in width and 20 rows in height with stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm.
